text: Hello, is there any way to hard code the value of a token into a url? For example {{contact.firstname="bob"}} so that it will populate the fields in a landing page with those values?
I think you’re looking for this Sarah, <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/forms/can-i-auto-populate-form-fields-through-a-query-string>
Thank you <@U7SL518D6> taking a look at this now

Hey <@U7SL518D6> I tried to use it lik e"<https://example.com/example-page?firstname=John&lastname=Smith&email=jsmith@email.com> " as the url but it doesnt work. What I would like to do is hardcoded those values so that when using incognito browser i can still see the personalization based on the url string
could you DM me a link to the page(with the parameters in the URL) so I can better see what you’re trying to do?
